Description: In the 1st person view, the player can aim at a teammate to make an info box appear, showing the teammate's health, ammo, etc. This "Always show teammate info" game setting allows the user to have these info boxes be permanently showing.

French.Translation: Toujours afficher les infos des coéquipiers

Italian.Translation: Mostra sempre info compagno di squadra

Polish.Translation: Zawsze pokazuj informacje o członku drużyny

Japanese.Translation: チームメイト情報を常に表示

name: MainMenu.Settings.AlwaysShowTeammateInfo
